Title: Establishes no itinerant vendor shall offer for sale baby food, nonprescription drugs, cosmetics and batteries
Summary: Establishes no itinerant vendor, except for a manufacturer, an authorized manufacturer's representative, or authorized distributor, shall offer for sale baby food, nonprescription drugs, cosmetics or batteries.
LawCode: Amd ยง38, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to itinerant vendors
